title: IAnnotation.ConvertToMultiJog
description: Converts a note with a leader to a note with a multi-jog leader.
signature:
System.Boolean ConvertToMultiJog( 
   System.Int32
LeaderNumber
,
   System.Int32
NumberOfPoints
,
   System.Object
PointsData
)

parameters.name: LeaderNumber
parameters.description: Number of the leader to convert in the 0-based list of leaders

parameters.name: NumberOfPoints
parameters.description: Number of the leader to convert in the 0-based list of leaders

returns: True if the leader is converted to a multi-jog leader, false if not
